Blog.post: I've decided to take the plunge. I am a grown-up and figured it was time for my daily thoughts and small rants to reflect that. A few of you may have known my, far between, lj entries "The Pink Fit." Now...you can find me posting on Loft 31. This will be space for the world to see, read, and enjoy. Ok...now I am going to get back to watching Liza's Biography. -Miss S

Matthew you should name your band after the scientific name instead and have people wondering what it means. My lovely scientist boyfriend informed me of the meaning of Amorphophallus titanum. I'm not sure I want to post the meaning up on here... I'll keep my posts clean. P.S. But you should definetly look it up...you'd probably get a laugh out of it.
It's now official...the name of my next band is going to be CORPSE FLOWER. Extremely tough and dark sounding while also being sensitive and fragile.

Cyndi and I just went to Samuri Sams and it wasnt half bad. Thanks for the recomendation on it Mathew. If you are down to hang out tonight give us a call. Additionally there will be a viewing of Six Feet Under tommorow so we better see you all.
Join us tonight for Blow Out and Queer Eye starting at 8 p.m. And I'm making cookies!!! See you guys tonight.

matthew and i won't be at 6 feet under tonight, because i am dragging him with me to day break while i study. ssshhhh! i don't want to hear it! he's coming with me and that's final. mwhha ha ha ha! we will, however be over for queer eye for the straight guy, if that's still on?

Hey all, I hope you all had a great weekend. It was a very pleasent surprise to see Sonia and Jackie sneek up on us when we got home. Cyndi and I thought we were about to be gunned down. Well, Six feet under is on at 9 tonight so come on OVER!!!! P.S. Sonia i put a link to the Best week ever blog under links
hey everyone...did you guys know there is a "best week ever blog?" yay! well i am off to the movies with the fabulous miss jackie.

Hey thanks for the invite Chris. My stupid home phone was turned off, so I can only get online at work now. That's the reason I've taken my sweet ass time joining up and all. Now maybe I won't feel so out of whatever loop there might be. I haven't been doing much of anything lately aside from working...so yeah. awesome! Jake
Have a good weekend all. I will post what time Six feet under will be on Monday.

Ahhh Matthew you got the Sims? It is sooo addicting. That's all I used to do last year. It was bad. And I sucked for awhile too until I figured out all the cheat codes. But I will keep you in suspense about those too (because I can't remember them right now, ha!) I hope nothing happened to you in this accident that you're leaving us all in suspense about. Wine bar tonight if you can make it out...then you can finish the story. I'll post a time for tonight some time today when I find out or we'll just give you a call. Hope to see everyone there tonight! :)

sorry I missed your call Chris. I didn't get the message about Chimy's until just a few minutes ago. So yeah, I'm back in town, and I have a story to tell everyone. When I was just south of Post, this suburban pulling a camper flipped right in front of me... I'll leave it at that and let the suspense build so you will all want me to tell you the story the next time you see me (or something like that). sad sidenote: I'm addicted to The Sims. even sadder sidenote: I suck at The Sims.
Whoa Chris! How did that happen? Are you just trying to steal my identity? Then we could be on those identity theft commercials and you can pretend you're me. Imagine that. Let's try this again...
Thats weird Cyndi posted under my name last time. I wonder how that happened. Just a reminder: Tonight Blowout and Queer Eye at my house. 2001 28th St Apt A. Festivities start around 8.

Hey Sonia I saw that Who's the Boss was having a marathon but I stayed away because I needed to finish my homework. Who needs homework when you can watch Who's the Boss all night long? I used to love that show along with TGIF. They need to bring that back. My friday nights just haven't been the same since.

Cyndi and I are down. Just let us know the time. Look at this insane email I just got from Yahoo: You are currently exceeding your Yahoo! Mail storage quota by a very large amount. You are only allowed -2048.0MB of storage but you are currently using 0.5MB of storage. Your account has been temporarily disabled from receiving new messages. These guys need to get their heads on straight.

ok...as we are all working to revive our "old group" jesse and i were talking about all of us getting together to a trip to chimmy's. any takers? also for you old school teevee fans...there is a "who's the boss" marathon. ahhh yeah!

okay. i'm on! now what to say, what to say. dang. got nothin'. sorry I won't make it out to the brewery tonight. but i assume jesse passed his thesis defense since everyone's going out? well, someone drink a brew for me (even though i don't normally drink them). over and out. (can i say that?)
You still alive Jessie?

hi kids...i am here! finally! it's like in gym class and you aren't the last kid picked for dodgeball. finally i am a winner! i too have joined blog-mania 2004. my spot is called loft 31. i don't quite know how to add people...so if you guys could help a sista out feel free.

Matthew, I'll be waiting for the dance moves...and Jesse you should really try and come. Good luck and try not to lose your mind. There will be no reason to "take it like a man" because I'm sure you'll do well.

I empathize with ya Jess. One of the most stressful times of my life was when I had my defense. I had been up for 48 straight hours, eating only BBQ Ruffles 3Ds, and drinking Code Red Mountain Dew. It was not pleasent. You will do fine though, I am sure of it. Just remember, if it does get bad you just have to bend over and take it like a man.

nice...last time i went to the wine bar, i had quite a few glasses and showed everyone my usher dance moves. so, yes, count me in for tonight. jesse, during my thesis defense, i just got used to saying, "yes dr. conrad, you're right and i am wrong." and the sad part is that i wasn't being sarcastic.

Its final, Im dreaming about my defense now. Im going crazy, so I might be up for a little wine later on. Chris I tried calling Dr. Pope and no answer. I sent him an email too. If he calls back should I invite him to the wine bar. Yeah, that would be a blast. Adios, Raul
9 tonight. wine bar. :)
Would anyone like to go to the wine bar or do something else tonight?
I think we're officially addicted.

Cyndi and I wanted to start this blog we thought it would be nice for all of us (friends and aquintances) to have a place to talk about things that are going on in Lubbock. We used to have one of these a while back but it ended up dying out as people moved away or became too consumed with work/school. So we are giving it another try. It was nice because it provided an open forum to talk about whatever you like such as things going on , things we don't like, upcomming hang out sessions, or just whatever the hell you want. This is suppose to be a happy place for all so don't get excessively crude or mean. If you do your posts will be deleted and you will be banned. And just as a reminder to any of you who may be newbies: make sure when you write a post to not only post it, but click on the "publish" button as well.
to Mrs. Avila!!! Thank you Sonia for putting the scavenger hunt together. It was the BEST!!! UPGRADE!! HUUUUGE UPGRADE! I already can't wait for the next one. :)

hi everyone... 1. i have always enjoyed listening rev. al. don't you guys think his mouth opens and closes like beaker from the muppets? 2. i will have to postpone the scavenger hunt. i can leave the clues though, if you guys want to still have the great hunt tonight. i couldn't get out of the 50th bday festivities for my mom. geez! colorado here i come!

I dont know what everyones political beliefs are but I found this quote from Rev. Al Sharpton right on point. I didnt think I would have ever quoted him in my life but........ Al Sharpton, 2004 National Democratic Convention, Boston

Cyndi and i went to go see Farenheit 9/11 last night with Brian and Christina and the movie was amazing. I know that there is the Moore slant on alot of the information portrayed in that movie, but still its impossible to hide the corruption and the fear that our government is instilling in the American people. Throughout the whole movie Cyndi and I were just getting more pissed off the more that Moore kept showing and uncovering. I strongly reccomend this to any of you who havent seen it!!!!!!!!!!!!

Now it's time to party and we'll party hard (party hard) Let's get a party going (let's get a party going) When it's time to party we will always party hard i have to deliver a birthday present to my friend jamie tonight, but other than that i'm down for hanging out as long as it is cheap or free. i mean, i'm all about the benjamins, obviously, but a brotha's gotta be thrifty.

hey kids... i have missed you all. the world is just not the same without all you. i am guessing that everyone had a fun holiday. down here it's been really humid and pretty much typical san antonio....busy, busy, lots of mexicans (haha). i've been busy at the job fair, doing a pharamaceutical observation, and the all important pedicure. i tried to email you chris...to send you and cyndi a hello but it emailed it back to me. to quote jackie "meh." so i am dying that blow out is over..and i missed it! argh. well count me in for bbq fun...at this time tomorrow i'll hit lubbrock like a hurricane. also...be prepared i've been working on the scavenger hunt! well i am off...i just had to reconnect with the world. oh yeah one more thing...i found fisheries jobs...odd huh?! -miss s shout out to: jackie, cyndi, chris, peanut, matthew, amy who wears fast socks, the newly official maxx, indie, mozzy, nags, missy, and everyone else who reads the blog.

a que tiempo es...taco tuesday? haha (no translation for that)

hey everyone...the blog looked lonely so I thought I would post a few tuesday thoughts. oh...sorry about that pic cyndi...i should have cropped it. i didn't think about it. oh and the radio show was fun to listen to. i have a nomination for your name...maybe the word star in some other language or something else asian inspired. just ideas. ok now for my rant. i know there has been some maroon 5 in the ears of lubbockites lately. has anyone seen the video for "she will be loved?" ok...i "love" this videa. now it's not all interesting and creative like say the modest mouse or franz ferdinand vids but this is like a mini-movie. it's a four minute movie that i will (a) not fall asleep during, (b) do not have to pay $4.50 for, (c) has no coming attractions to sit through, and (d) don't have to deal with people eating popcorn loudly next to me. but anyway..it's very Mrs.Robinson, but I wonder which lady ends up with Adam? What time is Taco Tues?

Whoa could my boobs look any bigger. Woohoo! Goodness. Hmm...I don't want to write my lab report...but someone's gotta do it. Taco Tuesday tomorrow my lovelies...and of course Queer Eye. See you all tomorrow.
